mapper.select: select p.PermissionID as menuId,p.PermissionName as menuName,p.URL as menuURL,p.ParentID as perentMenuId, p.Available as available,p.Description as menuDesc,p.PermissionMark as menuMark,p.PermissionType,p.Priority, p.CreateTime,p.LastTime from gm_role_permission,gm_user_role,gm_permission p LEFT JOIN gm_permission pa on p.parentId = pa.PermissionID WHERE p.PermissionType='menu' and p.Available=1 and p.PermissionMark not like '%Mobile%' and gm_role_permission.permissionId=p.permissionId and gm_role_permission.roleId=gm_user_role.roleId and gm_user_role.userId=#{userId} ORDER BY p.CreateTime
select permissionId as subSystemId,permissionName as subSystemName from gm_permission where permissionType = 'subsystem' order by priority
select distinct gm_permission.* from gm_permission,gm_role_permission where gm_role_permission.roleId=#{roleId} and gm_role_permission.permissionId=gm_permission.permissionId
mapper.delete: delete from gm_role_permission where roleId=#{roleId} and permissionId=#{permissionId}
